definition: lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
thoroughbred horse/refined and virtuous

sentences.english: Not all the intelligent rich can only be searched in the metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有的智富都只能在大都市中按图索骥。

sentences.english: Rang, I found this only do take-away of the Qin family bakery.
sentences.chinese: 按图索骥，我找到了这家只做外卖的秦家饼店。

sentences.english: He's ineffective because his approach is too rigid.
sentences.chinese: 他做什么事情都是按图索骥，效率太低。

sentences.english: The Michelin Guide, like Ariadne's thread, enables tourists to locate the best restaurants easily.
sentences.chinese: 米其林指南让游客按图索骥，轻松找到最好餐厅进餐。

definition: lit. drawing a tiger using a cat as a model (idiom); fig. to follow a model and get things more or less right but without capturing the spirit of the subject/uninspired imitation
lit. to draw a dipper with a gourd as a model (idiom)/fig. to copy slavishly
to find out/to search out/to uncover/to discover
lit. to fish a needle from the sea/to find a needle in a haystack (idiom)
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
to organize by categories/to classify
to inquire after/to look for (sb)
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
lit. to draw a dipper with a gourd as one's model (idiom)/fig. to follow the existing pattern without modification
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); a fleeting glance in passing/fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
lit. spider's thread and horse track/tiny hints (of a secret)/traces/clue
to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
to analyze thoroughly, point by point (idiom)
